projectInfo: A full-fledged, student-centered Course Evaluation website inspired by the existing Rate My Professor and made to streamline students' approach to researching Brandeis courses and professors pre-registration

A web application for music lovers to get track suggestions based on any lyrics/keywords or simply on their daily mood. The application also support Shazam-like track suggestions based on audio recordings

An Android mobile application dedicated to helping people get easier access to nearby medical facilities as well as to providing reminder and news features to ensure a convenient and informed health life

An event management application built with Angular, Python, and MySQL as a SWE Intern. It allows event coordinators to update monthly events, check in attendees using QR Code, and gather demographic data and reviews

Part of Brandeis Skunkworks Initiative. A Course Scheduler website for university administrators to streamline the course scheduling process for professors every semester via Manual and Automatic Scheduling
Develop and analyze a prediction model of metered building energy usage based on past data of over 1,000 buildings over 3 years with pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, LightGBM
A Python Deep Learning chatbot using NMT - Neural Machine Translation (seq2seq) with TensorFlow. The bot is trained using ~54 million Reddit comments from Jan 2015

A Java program that creates a word cloud with words tokenized from tweets collected from Twitter. The program also reports relevant statistics: percentage of US citizens, followers and statuses count, and top most used emojis

A Siri-inspired intelligent assistant operated through text-based input. It can talk about the weather, the calendar, mathematical calculation, and give Google search results. Ollie 2.0 also supports GUI
